name: Charan Singh
title: Full Stack Developer & Data Analyst
description: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with experience in building scalable web applications using React.js, Node.js, and Firebase.
I have worked on multiple projects including task management apps, project management tools, and portfolio websites with a focus on clean UI/UX design.
Apart from coding, I enjoy learning about data analytics, exploring new technologies, and maintaining discipline through fitness and running.
